summary: Completed testing of payroll adjustments module. Backend APIs are functional, but frontend login issues prevent full UI testing.

data_dependencies.impact: Unable to verify reimbursement creation functionality
Unable to verify arrears addition functionality
Unable to verify incentive addition functionality

ui_bugs.issue: Login functionality not working - form appears pre-filled but authentication fails

integration_issues.issue: Cannot access PayrollAdjustments page due to login failure

passed_tests: Bank formats include all required formats (HDFC, ICICI, SBI, AXIS, KOTAK)
PayrollAdjustments.tsx component exists and is properly routed
Backend route /api/payroll-adjustments is registered and accessible
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix login functionality - authentication is failing preventing access to PayrollAdjustments page. Verify login credentials, check backend authentication endpoint, and ensure frontend login form is working properly. Also consider adding sample employee data to enable full testing of POST endpoints.

success_percentage.backend: 60% (3/5 endpoints tested successfully, 2 skipped due to data dependency)
success_percentage.frontend: 20% (routing verified but UI not accessible due to login issues)
